TenantDates.title: TenantDates
TenantDates.description: If user provides any prompt like Show tenants whose agreement date starts January 2024 or whose agreement finishes May 2025, these kind of date related filters are eligible for this input.

TenantParameter.title: TenantParameter
TenantParameter.description: If user prompts Tenant's related unit or Leasee name to fetch tenant records, pass the unit name or lease name to this parameter.
